entry.title: Fingers Crossed
entry.summary:
Author: UnknownXFuture

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 381,804Chapters: 33/40Kudos: 968

Summary: “Have you ever heard of the butterfly effect?” He looked up and shook his head. “No… what is it?” “It’s the idea that the smallest of situations, can set the biggest consequences in motion. A butterfly flapping it’s wings on one side of the world, creates a hurricane on the other.” He nodded, that’s exactly how this situation sounds right now. If he and Scott never went out that fateful night and looked for that body, or if he and Derek never became friends, or hell, if he never agreed to Deatons plan in the first place… then none of this would be happening. But fuck it, ‘caution’ isn’t in his vocabulary. ~~~ UPDATING SOON <3 (I’m currently going through the entire story from the beginning and changing ALOT. Full warning, until I’m done, there will be a few confusing moments. Srry in advance <3)

entry.title: fragmentary blue
entry.summary:
Author: idyllic_dae

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 19,256Chapters: 4/?Kudos: 338

Summary: "He's harmless. Look at him," Derek says, and Stiles bristles."I am not—""You smell what I do," Talia speaks over him. "Do not be so easily fooled."Stiles isn't sure whose side to take. If he agrees with Talia, he argues against being set free. If he agrees with Derek, he admits he's weak and helpless. Neither option is appealing."Yes," Derek says. "But he's a kid, and he's terrified—""Actually, I'm seventeen and very brave—""—and he has no idea what he is."

entry.title: Change On The Rise
entry.summary:
Author: evvrythingisawesome

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 57,644Chapters: 37/75Kudos: 37

Summary: (Teen Wolf/Stargate Crossover AU continuation)As summer draws to a close, the Littlefield pack continues their long road to recovery. Still reeling from his sister's death and resurrection, Derek returns to his quest for the truth of his lost Hale ancestor; Cora grapples with the consequences of everything that transpired over the summer, including her return from the dead; and Stiles finds new ways to balance the desires of his inner demons with the needs of his pack.

entry.summary:

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 12,936Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 80

Summary: Stiles Stilinski had never thought, this would be the end of his life. But regardless, he knew in a way- that it was always a possibility. He was a human who ran with wolves, a human who loved wolves. Fortunately, the searing burn of pain that had been spreading through him was now numb.how sad is it that dying has finally made how Derek feels for him crystal clear. entry.title: Wounds That Bind
entry.summary:
Author: 177A_BleekerSt

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,900Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 27

Summary: After a brutal battle with harpies leaves Derek poisoned and near death, the Hale Pack races to save him. In his delirium, Derek shocks everyone by calling out for Peter—the uncle he’s long resented. As Peter rushes to his side, buried bonds resurface, tested by guilt, love, and vulnerability. With Stiles fiercely protective and Deaton’s herbs working their miracle, uncle and nephew find unexpected healing—in body, heart, and family.

entry.title: Riptide - Cognitive Dissonance
entry.summary:
Author: Azraphels

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 132,429Chapters: 7/18Kudos: 36

Summary: If Liam had been asked again to choose between getting in the car with Theo and leaving with him, or staying in Beacon Hills to protect it from the new threat, he would definitely have said "Yes.""Yes" to killing Theo at the exact moment when Liam's summary sentence, "So, some crazy person's notes ended up in the hands of another crazy person who is now looking for a gri-something that does ultra-crazy things?" would be answered with "Well, yes, that's the summary."If Mason were asked, he would say that besides the ghouls who wanted to eat him, the possessed nuns who wanted to kidnap Liam, his own kidnapping, seeing Nolan as a human sacrifice by a tribe, losing Corey in the Appalachian Mountains, and watching that crazy psychopath almost rip Theo's arm off, he would definitely do it all again!𝐎𝐑 ｡ ｡ ｡ The gang ends up taking a trip across the United States to try to stop Monroe's plans!

entry.title: His Guardian Angel
entry.summary:
Author: sterektaboosmut

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 13,649Chapters: 7/?Kudos: 48

Summary: I've always had an overprotective streak when it comes to my younger brother, Stiles. He's as sweet as they come. Innocent as hell, or should I say, Heaven. He's in his first year of college, away from home, away from me. Surrounded by hundreds of horny students, waiting for the perfect time to take advantage of him. I know, because everyone wants him.If I didn't keep an eye on him, someone would take him, make him their own. And I can't let that happen. I have to make sure he stays pure, make sure he saves himself for a man that's worthy of him. But there's only one person who can take Stiles.He is mine, he just doesn't know it yet. He may be far from me, but I'm always watching over him. Like his guardian angel. Because I love him. And when he needs me, I need to make sure I'm there, ready for anything.No one will touch what's mine.Stiles won't let it.I won't let it.

entry.title: The Creator's Game
entry.summary:
Author: Glitter_Lips

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 115,098Chapters: 33/37Kudos: 39

Summary: Everyone in my story is dead. Alec has been a Beacon Hills resident and a McCall pack member for just over a year, and he’s finally starting to feel comfortable and safe after his near death experience at the hands of Monroe and her hunter army. He doesn’t want to get involved in the war ever again, content to play lacrosse and live his life.But Monroe isn’t finished yet, and she won’t rest until all supernatural people are wiped out for good. Her plans won’t allow Alec to stay uninvolved forever, and his past threatens to catch up with him no matter how badly he had hoped to keep those secrets buried.

entry.title: Echoes of You (Traduccion de "Hasta Encontrarte")
entry.summary:
Author: ariadna19

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,994Chapters: 5/?Kudos: 21

Summary: Beacon Hills was eerily silent.It wasn’t the kind of silence that comes before a storm, nor the hush of a forest at dusk. It was a void. As if something had been ripped out of the world… and no one could remember what.Scott noticed it first. Lydia felt it in her bones. Malia smelt it in the air. But no one could name it. No one could say what was missing.Except Derek. From the moment he crossed the town’s border, he knew something essential was gone. He couldn’t explain it, couldn’t name it, but he felt it like an open wound. And he wouldn’t stop until he discovered what—or who—had been erased from the world.----------------------------------------------------------------------------------💭What if the pack had called Derek during the Ghost Riders disaster in season 6A? What if he were the only one who could feel Stiles’ absence?
